scripts.deploy:arbitrum-satsuma: graph deploy sales-arbitrum --version-label VERSION_LABEL --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key SATSUMA_DEPLOY_KEY --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
